note.p: Fruit and hop grower. Of East Farleigh, Kent. Married Isabella Martineau, daughter of Dr James Martineau, Unitarian minister, in 1853. Died in Rome.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/939/129/3), 1881 (RG11/926/129/9)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations) 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 January 2014).
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1870
